mapper.select: select A.id, u.nickName, A.integral count from (select id, integral from integral where date = CURDATE() order by integral ${t} limit 10) A left join user u on u.id = A.id
select id, nickName, intergral count from user order by intergral ${t} limit 10
select id, nickName, intergral count from user order by continuous ${t} limit 10
